short.ar: قم بتشغيل متجرك الخاص في محاكي مطعم برجر لتجربة لحظات لذيذة.
short.am: ጣፋጭ የሆኑ ወቅቶችን ለማየት የራስህን ሱቅ በበርገር ምግብ ቤት ሲምዩሌተር አድርግ።
short.bg: Стартирайте свой собствен магазин в симулатор бургер ресторант, за да изпитате вкусни моменти.
short.bn: সুস্বাদু মুহুর্তগুলি অনুভব করতে বার্গার রেস্তোঁরা সিমুলেটরে আপনার নিজের দোকান চালান।
short.ca: Gestiona la teva pròpia botiga al simulador d'hamburgueseries per viure moments deliciosos.
short.cs: Spusťte svůj vlastní obchod v simulátoru burger restaurace a zažijte lahodné okamžiky.
short.da: Kør din egen butik i burger restaurant simulator for at opleve lækre øjeblikke.
short.de: Betreibe deinen eigenen Laden im Burger-Restaurant-Simulator, um köstliche Momente zu erleben.
short.el: Τρέξτε το δικό σας κατάστημα στον προσομοιωτή εστιατορίου burger για να ζήσετε γευστικές στιγμές.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Run your own shop in burger restaurant simulator to experience delicious moments.
short.es: Dirige tu propia tienda en el simulador de restaurante de hamburguesas para experimentar deliciosos momentos.
short.et: Korraldage oma pood burgerirestorani simulaatoris, et kogeda maitsvaid hetki.
short.fa: فروشگاه خود را در شبیه ساز رستوران برگر اجرا کنید تا لحظات خوشمزه ای را تجربه کنید.
short.fi: Pidä omaa myymälääsi hampurilaisravintolasimulaattorissa kokeaksesi herkullisia hetkiä.
short.fil: Patakbuhin ang iyong sariling shop sa burger restaurant simulator upang makaranas ng masarap na sandali.
short.fr: Gérez votre propre boutique dans le simulateur de restaurant de hamburgers pour vivre de délicieux moments.
short.gu: સ્વાદિષ્ટ પળોનો અનુભવ કરવા માટે બર્ગર રેસ્ટોરન્ટ સિમ્યુલેટરમાં તમારી પોતાની દુકાન ચલાવો.
short.he: הפעל חנות משלך בסימולטור מסעדת המבורגרים כדי לחוות רגעים טעימים.
short.hi: स्वादिष्ट क्षणों का अनुभव करने के लिए बर्गर रेस्तरां सिम्युलेटर में अपनी खुद की दुकान चलाएं।
short.hr: Pokrenite vlastitu trgovinu u simulatoru burger restorana kako biste doživjeli ukusne trenutke.
short.hu: Futtassa saját üzletét a hamburger étterem szimulátorban, hogy megtapasztalja a finom pillanatokat.
short.id: Jalankan toko Anda sendiri di simulator restoran burger untuk mengalami saat-saat lezat.
short.it: Gestisci il tuo negozio nel simulatore di ristoranti di hamburger per vivere momenti deliziosi.
short.ja: ハンバーガーレストランシミュレーターで自分のショップを運営して、おいしい瞬間を体験してください。
short.kn: ರುಚಿಕರವಾದ ಕ್ಷಣಗಳನ್ನು ಅನುಭವಿಸಲು ಬರ್ಗರ್ ರೆಸ್ಟೋರೆಂಟ್ ಸಿಮ್ಯುಲೇಟರ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸ್ವಂತ ಅಂಗಡಿಯನ್ನು ನಡೆಸಿ.
short.ko: 햄버거 레스토랑 시뮬레이터에서 자신의 가게를 운영하여 맛있는 순간을 경험하세요.
short.lv: Vadiet savu veikalu burgeru restorāna simulatorā, lai piedzīvotu gardus mirkļus.
short.ml: രുചികരമായ നിമിഷങ്ങൾ ആസ്വദിക്കാൻ ബർഗർ റെസ്റ്റോറന്റ് സിമുലേറ്ററിൽ നിങ്ങളുടെ സ്വന്തം ഷോപ്പ് പ്രവർത്തിപ്പിക്കുക.
short.mr: स्वादिष्ट क्षणांचा अनुभव घेण्यासाठी बर्गर रेस्टॉरंट सिम्युलेटरमध्ये आपले स्वतःचे दुकान चालवा.
short.ms: Jalankan kedai anda sendiri di restoran burger simulator untuk mengalami detik-detik yang lazat.
short.nl: Run je eigen winkel in burger restaurant simulator om heerlijke momenten te ervaren.
short.no: Kjør din egen butikk i burgerrestaurantsimulator for å oppleve deilige øyeblikk.
short.pl: Prowadź własny sklep w symulatorze burgerowni, aby przeżyć pyszne chwile.
short.ro: Conduceți-vă propriul magazin în simulatorul restaurantului burger pentru a experimenta momente delicioase.
short.ru: Управляйте собственным магазином в симуляторе бургерного ресторана, чтобы испытать вкусные моменты.
short.sk: Prevádzkujte svoj vlastný obchod v simulátore hamburgerovej reštaurácie a zažite chutné chvíle.
short.sl: Vodite svojo trgovino v simulatorju restavracije z burgerji in doživite okusne trenutke.
short.sv: Kör din egen butik i burger restaurang simulator för att uppleva läckra stunder.
short.sw: Endesha duka lako mwenyewe katika simulator ya mgahawa wa burger ili kupata wakati mzuri.
short.ta: சுவையான தருணங்களை அனுபவிக்க பர்கர் உணவக சிமுலேட்டரில் உங்கள் சொந்த கடையை இயக்கவும்.
short.te: రుచికరమైన క్షణాలను అనుభవించడానికి బర్గర్ రెస్టారెంట్ సిమ్యులేటర్లో మీ స్వంత దుకాణాన్ని నడపండి.
short.th: เปิดร้านของคุณเองในร้านเบอร์เกอร์จําลองเพื่อสัมผัสกับช่วงเวลาแสนอร่อย
short.tr: Lezzetli anlar yaşamak için burger restoran simülatöründe kendi dükkanınızı çalıştırın.
short.uk: Запустіть власний магазин у симуляторі ресторану бургерів, щоб пережити смачні моменти.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Burger Restaurant Simulator, the taste of feeding your customers delicious hamburgers and running a pleasant cafe is at your fingertips. This unique cafe business simulator combines the visual aesthetics of 2D graphics with great sound effects, giving you an unforgettable experience.

Two different game modes are waiting for you in the game. First, let's get acquainted with the career mode. In this mode, you have an excellent opportunity to test your business skills. You must use all your skills within a certain time to reach the targeted turnover. Although the first levels seem to be about learning how to prepare delicious hamburgers, it will get more complicated in the following levels. As you race against the clock, you must use your quick thinking and trading skills to fulfill orders correctly.

The free-play mode offers a more comfortable experience. In this mode, you must prepare and serve customer orders quickly. By shouldering the entire business burden, you can get caught up in the bustle of the cafe world and test your speed.

Known as the hamburger game, this game adds a new dimension to restaurant business games. Both game modes offer you the pleasure of casual gaming while testing your business skills and speed. If you are into restaurant games, Burger Restaurant Simulator is here to give you a realistic experience.

Do your best to handle each order, keep customers happy, and grow your business. Join this delicious adventure waiting for you between casual games and enjoy managing your hamburger restaurant.

How To Play
You can prepare the orders from the customers with the help of the mouse. Remember customers don't have much time so you have to prepare the burger as soon as possible.

Burger Restaurant Simulator Features
✓ Realistic sounds
✓ 2D Graphics
✓ 2 Different Mode
✓ Easy control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Burger Restaurant Simulator extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
